alert.note: Alert for Lane; Ness (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 8:57PM CDT until May 04 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Ness County in west central Kansas... East central Lane County in west central Kansas... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 853 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Alamota, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Ness and east central Lane Counties. This severe thunderstorm warning replaces the previous warning that was in effect. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
